SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package repository

Class MedicalRecordRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.MedicalRecordRepository
public class MedicalRecordRepository extends Object
The MedicalRecordRepository class manages CRUD operations for medical records stored in a CSV file. It provides functionality to load, search, add, and update medical records while maintaining the integrity of the underlying data storage.

  • Method Details

    • loadMedicalRecords

      public List<MedicalRecord> loadMedicalRecords() throws IOException
      Load all medical records from the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord objects representing all medical records in the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading the CSV file.

    • findRecordsByPatientId

      public List<MedicalRecord> findRecordsByPatientId(String patientID) throws IOException
      Find all medical records for a specific patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord objects associated with the specified patient ID.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading the CSV file.

    • findRecordsByDoctorId

      public List<MedicalRecord> findRecordsByDoctorId(String doctorID) throws IOException
      Find all medical records for a specific doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord objects associated with the specified doctor ID.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading the CSV file.

    • addMedicalRecord

      public void addMedicalRecord(MedicalRecord newRecord) throws IOException
      Add a new medical record to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      newRecord - The MedicalRecord object to be added.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error writing to the CSV file.

    • getLastRecordId

      public String getLastRecordId() throws IOException
      Retrieve the last record ID from the existing medical records.
      Returns:
      The last record ID, or "R000" if no records exist.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading the CSV file.

    • updateMedicalRecord

      public boolean updateMedicalRecord(String recordId, String newDiagnosis, String newTreatment, String newPrescription) throws IOException
      Update the diagnosis, treatment, and prescription of a medical record based on the record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the record to be updated.
      newDiagnosis - The new diagnosis to set.
      newTreatment - The new treatment to set.
      newPrescription - The new prescription to set.
      Returns:
      true if the record was found and updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading or writing to the CSV file.
